name: Bridging the AI adoption gap: turning experiments into enterprise value
title: Bridging the AI adoption gap: turning experiments into enterprise value
abstract: How businesses can successfully bridge the AI adoption gap.
body: AI is more than a buzzword. Across various industries, it’s proving value by streamlining operations, enhancing decision-making and unlocking new levels of efficiency. But despite its potential, many businesses are still struggling to realize their AI ambitions—caught in limbo between experimentation and execution.

name: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, June 11 (game #731)
title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, June 11 (game #731)
abstract: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzle.
body: Good morning! Let's play Connections, the NYT's clever word game that challenges you to group answers in various categories. It can be tough, so read on if you need Connections hints.

name: Nearly half of U.S. adults disapprove of Trump's handling of protests: Poll
title: Nearly half of U.S. adults disapprove of Trump's handling of protests: Poll
abstract: A plurality of Americans don't approve of the Trump administration's deployment of the National Guard and Marines in response to Los Angeles protests, the latest YouGov polling shows.
body: A plurality of Americans don't approve of the Trump administration's deployment of the National Guard and Marines in response to protests.

name: OpenAI taps Google's cloud to deal with demand crush, source says

name: At least 10 dead in Austrian school shooting

abstract: The gunman, a 21-year-old former student, also died in the incident in the city of Graz.

name: Rep. Mannion says he yelled at Rep. Lawler because of what happened to Sen. Padilla
title: Rep. Mannion says he yelled at Rep. Lawler because of what happened to Sen. Padilla
abstract: Lawler says Mannion should "go seek help for anger management — and f*** off."

name: Australia bans financial adviser for 10 years for $9.6M crypto scam
title: Australia bans financial adviser for 10 years for $9.6M crypto scam

body: Australia’s markets regulator has banned a financial adviser from offering financial services for 10 years, alleging she deceptively invested her clients’ money into a crypto platform listed as a possible scam.

name: Westchester District Attorney looking into West Harrison bear euthanization
title: Westchester District Attorney looking into West Harrison bear euthanization
abstract: The police said the bear in West Harrison was put down June 2 after it continually moved in a densely populated area and went into several backyards.
